name: Explosive Problems
description:
Multiplayer Parkour First Person Shooter made for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2 ('LET THERE BE CHAOS').

Made solo by this guy, you can wall run, slide and grapple your way around a large hub area featuring 3 Multiplayer Arenas and 2 Race Tracks you can play solo (plus its filled with 20 Hidden Secrets).

All the areas are connected and people can drop in and out anywhere, fights often spill out of the arenas. Plus with ragdoll physics and physics objects all around the place it gets pretty damn chaotic so... Chaos has been let
